newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: RESEARCH ALERT - Fraser upgrades FELS.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Fraser upgrades FELS.

text.p: Fraser Securities Pte Ltd said on Friday it has upgraded its recommendation for rig builder Far East Levingston Shipbuilding (FELS) to "hold" from "underweight".
Fraser said in a research note it remained concerned by increasing competition despite the group's confidence it would win more contracts based on its track record and expertise.
"As such, we are upgrading our recommendation to a hold from underweight previously," it said.
